title: Task Analysis: Improve Excel Sheet Formatting
content: The user wants me to improve the formatting and presentation of an Excel sheet. I will use the spreadsheet specialist to handle the task. I need to provide specific instructions to the specialist to ensure the output meets industry standards. I will focus on aspects like column widths, font styles, colors, headers, and the overall visual appeal of the data. I will ensure that the sheet looks professional and easy to read.
summary: Analysis of the task to improve Excel sheet formatting and presentation.
